Had an interview today for an animal tech position. I know, I know.... its a little outa my realm, but we will see where it goes. The pay is pretty good for a part time position.
Well, just been out at Colonial every day since Wednesday. It's been alot of fun and alot of eye candy :) Had jury duty today and was already released... only took 30 min. Thats about it

Yesterday i found out that a friend of mines dad had a limited time left with us. he doesn't read my site so I guess I am just hoping outloud for him. so bud, i hope and wish the best for ya. Coulter Johnson ---on his cell phone

Well, sorry its taken me so long to get urlLink Anna Marie's BDay pics up. Had a family emergency. They are uploading as we speak. Might be a while for all of them to get up there.... There is a bunch of them.

Well went to KAtie and Dre's house warming party last night. Check out the pics urlLink here .

I am now using blogger instead of MoveableType to post a blog. The main reason for the switch is so I won't wave to keep up with security problems. Blogger will do it for me. Anyway if you want to see the previous articles go urlLink here .

Went and saw the new Spiderman movie last night. Was pretty good. Had some cheesy lines, but that was expected, it's bbased off a comic book. Any way go see it it in a theater. If you enjoyed the first one you will like this one.

Well, found out what the holes were in my brain. They weren't holes! They were actually scar tissue from severe migranes. Anyway, I go get tested for my memory on Monday. Then they will decide on the kinds of medications I need. He said if they could get the right meds that it might be possible to remember everything from now on... be kinda crazy. Had a great biz idea, might start looking into it. wouldn't cost that much to get up and going. So I will see.

Well hung out with my dad for a good portion of the day. Went to see the Salvidor Dali exhibit. After that we got into a huge fight. Think we have made up though. Went over to Nana's parents house for a party... urlLink check out the pics here . Twas a lot of fun... I'm having probs with my insurance so gotta run. I wanted to write more. Oh well...

The day kind of started off slow. Just watched the discovery channel about time travel. Really wierd stuff. The faster you go, you go into the future. As soon as you pass the speed of light, you start going back into time. So one of my questions that they never answered is - So if I am picking up speed and all of the sudden I pass the speed of light, shouldn't I automatically go back to when I wasn't breaking the speed of light. So really I could never break the speed of light. Am I making any sense? So after the discovery channel, went to the pool with the girls again, Tony and I went to Rockfish, hung out with my dad. We had a talk, he finally listened to me I think. Guess we will see. Candice's engagement party was last night. I took my camera, but didn't really know any one there. So I did not take pics. And for all ya'll out there that aren't sure which girl is right for you... urlLink Mary-Kate or Ashley that is, take this quiz so you'll know.

Well, I finally got a gmail account... it will eventually replace my hotmail account. i am not going to list it here, because I will get spam. its my firstandlastname@gmail.com . Very cool it has 1gb of storage!

Went to the concert in the gardens Thurs. and listened to the Fort Worth Orchrista play Mozart. Had a good time. Yesterday looked for jobs online. Then went swimming for a few hours. Thats about it for me...

Check out this article on the BBC... We have urlLink teleported some atoms . Now if we are ever able to teleport humans, that would change the world. I hope I live to see that day. Today I was pretty productive, did a shit load of laundry, dishes, and kinda cleaned up. Then went to Uncle Julio's... Went swimming. Then tried sushi for the first and last time. That had to be some of the worst shit ever. Ended up over at the girls house watching movies. Just got home.

went to the lake yesterday and saw Shrek 2... bout it. today I got a call from a recruiter saying that there might be a position opening up in north Fort Worth for an IT guy... so give out some hope for me... I also applied for what looks like a sweet job in Honduras with Lockheed Martin. newayz

went swimming yesterday... urlLink see pics here Then went to Acoustic Mafia... Pics are uploading urlLink here right now. And since Acoustic Mafia was on... there are some more urlLink tit shots :) even a couchie...

Eric made fark! urlLink Check it out . Congrats to Eric! I know for those of you who know him, one of his dreams probably came true...

Yesterday I was pretty busy. I went and met with a reporter for the Fort Worth Star Telegram with my dad. The are doing a story on a guy we know named Blake. It should be coming out soon. Then I went to the pool with the girls again. Came home took a nap. Then went up to the Red Goose and then went to New Orleans Nights.

didn't do much. Went to that interview. I don't think I did well. I was interviewed by a bunch of BIG guys with shaved heads. The first thing they asked was "Do you work out?" So after I realized that it was not going well, when it got to the point where they ask if I had any questions for them... I said "Yeah, do I have to shave my head to work here?" They just kinda looked at each other for a min. and started to laugh. It was pretty funny. Probably one of those times you had to be there. Later on I went and hung out with the girls for a while at the Goose. Once we went upstairs I started to get one of my headaches. I just can't take those flashing lights for to long. So I left. Make sure everyone looks at urlLink Sunday the 13th on the calendar . Kinda a big day. Lots going on. And is any one gonna own up to who put this comment on urlLink my pic ? I might want to meet ya :) tis all

Well lately I have just been looking around for jobs, mostley in Brazil and other latin american countries. Flickerstick was awesome of course. Also heard another cool band Spoonfed Tribe. Monday went out to the golf course. Today I have an interview for a management position... wish me luck. It is supposed to rain all day today, i think
Just been swimming for the past 2 days with Dre, Kristi (Creamy), Katie, Tony, Busta, Anna MArie, and Kim... Have a fever blister - Sux... 'bout it...

Well for those of you who know me, you probably know that I am renowned for my horrible memory. I went to get it checked out, because I think it is getting worse. I had an MRI. While the MRI did not show anything about my memory loss, it does show that I have 2 funny looking small holes in my frontal lobe. They think it is one of two things. Either brain bleeds, or early signs of multiple sclerosis. I personally don't think it is the latter. I was in a bad 4 wheeler accident when I was in the 8th grade. I actually cracked the helmet in two. So it is probably just some old scar tissue from that. Any way the doc is setting up an appointment for a neurologist just to make sure. I am not really worried... prob not a big deal. I am hoping more so that the doctor can help with my memory.

Today Brian, Tony and I just cooked out inside... Went out to the pool and drank margaritas all day. Tiffany, Jordan, Dusty, and Billy showed up... Looks like we are about to have another tornado, so I'm back at home.

Went out to Eagle Mountain lake all day for Memorial Day. See all the pics urlLink here (It might take a while to get them all uploaded. There are 41 pics all together.) Hope everyone had a good time, and a safe holiday. Update: ok, all of the pictures are up now... sorry about the wait.

Being mosquito season again, I started to wonder why we have them... See my urlLink previous article here . Any way I was doing some reading over at urlLink straightdope.com and found this urlLink article . Basically if a mosquito lands on you let him bite you. It's kinda hard to let him do it because everyone's reaction is to kill them. Anyway, once he bites you stretch your skin. Her needle will get stuck, and she can't stop the blood from coming in. She will eventually rupture. I know it's kinda a sick way for them to die. But they are stealing your blood. Once they bite you, you will still get a mosquito bump any way... So you might as well kill them slowly :P

If you want to have a high quality pic printed you can always save the file to a CD or what ever media and take it to a Walgreens and have them printed. Personally I use Shutterfly. When you are looking at a photo that you want to print, there will be a link in the upper right hand corner it says "print this photo with shutterfly". The pictures are high quality, they don't fade, etc... 4x6's are 29 cents. Cheaper than taking them in to get done. Do what ever, it don't bother me...

I know that I have not been posting much lately, but this past week has pretty much been hell. I have just had a bad week. Yesterday was just the iceing on the cake. First a tree fell on my foot. No, I am not talking about a potted tree. I am talking about a 15-20 foot tree. It got a hold of my big toe. Then after work, I got into a wreck. Some lady backed into me. So Monday I have to take care of that.... Hope next week is better :(

Well went to Best Buy to get an Ipod today. I bought an open box Ipod 4g 20 gb for 39 bucks! I wanted to get the waranty, so when the clerck went to put in the cost for the opened ipod she typed in the cost of the waranty... awesome!
